title: Apple accidentally leaked some of its upcoming chip bumps
summary: Apple appears to have inadvertently included details about several of its upcoming devices in code spotted by MacRumors. One part of the code suggests that Apple plans on putting an M5 chip in its next-gen Vision Pro headset, aligning with a previous report from supply chain...
fullContent: Apple appears to have inadvertently included details about several of its upcoming devices in code spotted by MacRumors. One part of the code suggests that Apple plans on putting an M5 chip in its next-gen Vision Pro headset, aligning with a previous report from supply chain analyst Ming-Chi Kuo. fullContent: Vodafone Idea Q1 Results: Vodafone Idea widened its net losses to Rs 6,608 crore in the June ended quarter versus Rs 6,432 crore reported in the year ago period. title: Hong Kong revs up development of autonomous vehicles with new, expanded trials
summary: Hong Kong is ramping up efforts to develop driverless vehicle services by launching a trial at Cyberport and expanding an initiative at the West Kowloon arts hub following road tests in other areas.
fullContent: Hong Kong is ramping up efforts to develop driverless vehicle services by launching a trial at Cyberport and expanding an initiative at the West Kowloon arts hub following road tests in other areas. The Transport Department said on Thursday that mainland Chinese tech giant Baidu was also interested in applying to test autonomous vehicles in Kai Tak, in addition to its trials in Northern Lantau and Tung Chung. The trial at the West Kowloon Cultural District was expected to move forward to road...

title: US Producer Prices Climb by Most in Three Years
summary: US wholesale inflation rose in July by the most in three years, as the producer price index increased 0.9% from a month earlier after no change in June, and 3.3% from a year ago. Meanwhile, initial jobless claims decreased by 3,000 to 224,000 in the week ended Aug.
fullContent: US wholesale inflation rose in July by the most in three years, as the producer price index increased 0.9% from a month earlier after no change in June, and 3.3% from a year ago. Meanwhile, initial jobless claims decreased by 3,000 to 224,000 in the week ended Aug. 9, while continuing claims fell to 1.95 million in the previous week. Jonathan Ferro and Lisa Abramowicz report on Bloomberg Television.

title: CK Hutchison Rules Out Ports Deal Being Completed This Year
summary: CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd. ruled out the likelihood of the controversial sale of its global ports to a BlackRock Inc.-backed consortium being completed this year but stayed optimistic about the deal’s prospects after inviting a Chinese investor into the mix.
fullContent: CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd. ruled out the likelihood of the controversial sale of its global ports to a BlackRock Inc.-backed consortium being completed this year but stayed optimistic about the deal’s prospects after inviting a Chinese investor into the mix.
